plot: A young teacher is placed in a highschool for underpriviledged students. Although she faces initial hostility, she devotes herself to becoming a true educator and mentor for her pupils.
title: Eoneu yeogyosaui sugi
plot_es: A young teacher is placed in a highschool for underpriviledged students. Although she faces initial hostility, she devotes herself to becoming a true educator and mentor for her pupils.
plot_en: A young teacher is placed in a highschool for underpriviledged students. Although she faces initial hostility, she devotes herself to becoming a true educator and mentor for her pupils.
